name: NIST AI Risk Management Framework
description: NIST AI Risk Management Framework (AI RMF 1.0) for managing AI risks. Organized into four core functions: Govern, Map, Measure, and Manage, with bias assessment categories.

sections.title: Govern
sections.description: Policies, processes, procedures, and practices for AI risk management are in place and implemented.

sections.title: Map
sections.description: Context is recognized and risks related to the AI system are identified.

sections.title: Measure
sections.description: Identified risks are assessed, analyzed, or tracked using quantitative and qualitative methods.

sections.title: Manage
sections.description: Risks are prioritized and acted upon based on projected impact.
